body_html: @rw I've just recently needed to implement this distribution and have some code that is based on the contrib.distributions interface (now in the process of being moved into the core). I haven't implemented the sampling algorithm yet and I only handle the p=3 and p=4 cases, but if you haven't already solved this problem I'm willing to share my code. Once I've got things in good shape I was planning on contributing it to TF.
